html: .@USPS is the most popular agency in the U.S. government with an 88% approval rating. It employs 500,000 Americans (30% of which are vets) & links 157 million American households and businesses together. In my district, USPS employs over 3,300 people.
text: .@USPS is the most popular agency in the U.S. government with an 88% approval rating. It employs 500,000 Americans (30% of which are vets) & links 157 million American households and businesses together. In my district, USPS employs over 3,300 people.

html: The @USPS has been utilized in America since it was written into our constitution in 1787. Throughout my time in Congress, I've been an ardent supporter of the agency. Unfortunately, the Trump administration has made it a priority to privatize this historic institution.

html: Meet Abria. Abria has been taking insulin since being diagnosed with Type-1 Diabetes (T1D) 2 years ago. Since her diagnosis, insulin has skyrocketed from $95 to $600 per bottle. The monthly cost now--$2,000 for insulin and needles--is not fully covered by Missouri Medicaid.pic.twitter.com/CHVd2YjPT6
text:
Meet Abria.

Abria has been taking insulin since being diagnosed with Type-1 Diabetes (T1D) 2 years ago. Since her diagnosis, insulin has skyrocketed from $95 to $600 per bottle. The monthly cost now--$2,000 for insulin and needles--is not fully covered by Missouri Medicaid.pic.twitter.com/CHVd2YjPT6

html: I was honored to be at the First Day of Issuance for the "Turning the Tide" WWI stamps last week. A lot of hard work by @JudgeTedPoe, @RepDLamborn, and myself went into making these happen. Happy they turned out so great! @USPS @PostalMuseum @TheWWImuseumpic.twitter.com/1gXgu26f2u
